summary: Every year we audit the consolidated financial statements of the U.S. government . During our FY 2018 audit , we found that corrective actions were not complete for certain previously reported deficiencies in the processes used to prepare the financial statements. We also identified additional deficiencies related to the preparation process: Certain disclosures related to new federal accounting standards were not included Restatements and adjustments...
title: Management Report: Improvements Needed in Controls over the Processes Used to Prepare the U.S. Consolidated Financial Statements
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
